recipesJson.name: Swedish Fishes (Simple DIY E-liquid Candy Recipe)
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
A vape that tastes just like a handful of swedish fish
Made for "Let's Mix: Swedish Fishes"
-> http://bit.ly/2FHBXjk

reviews.text: Excellent! I love this recipe so much, I made a second batch for my pods using 55% VG and 12% nic. Will definitely mix again. Thank you Wayne!
I love this simple but yet spot on Swedish fish. When I need something quick and simple this is my go to.
I've been looking for a good Swedish Fish recipe and I think this is it.   27 Fish and juicy Strawberry with the vanilla swirl blend together to create an authentic Swedish Fish taste and mouthfeel.

pageContext.name: Swedish Fishes (Simple DIY E-liquid Candy Recipe)
